name: Framed (itch) (JustinVo)
description:
Developed by Council of Frogs for the Brighton:Develop Game Jam 2019.



As the highest-ranking detective pigeon, frame someone else for the destruction of the Brighton Pier to save your own feathers.

Features:

  • Explore the Brighton Beachfront as Henry the pigeon.
  • Do not get caught by the pesky humans as you find your target!
  • Continue your stealthy existence as your eavesdrop on whatever your target is saying,
  • Use their words against them as you scramble their words to create a, totally legit, new sentence that frames them.

Instructions:
Use escape or P to attempt to scramble the solution
Use WASD to move.
Use the mouse to look around.

Credits:
Xandra Van Antwerpen: Characters and Environments, Game Concept.
Justin van Oort: Design and Tech, Audio, Game Concept.
